plot: Tennogofune Academy's is a home for students with "negative karma," otherwise known as misfortune. The school's class 1-7 has collected students burdened with negative karma. Hibari finds her first day of school ends in bad luck. Hanako noticeably suffers from poor health. Together, the two unlucky high school students might find their school life will become a "blessing." (from manga)
ending_theme: "Ashita de Ii Kara" (明日でいいから; Leave it For Tomorrow) by Happy Clover
